godaremat say: "A little curious, how come disc 5 is smaller then the rest? This one fits on a regular DVD while the others require double-layer discs..."
Disc 5 contain "Special Features" only, not any episodes. And yes it fits on a regular DVD5 disc. For more details refer http://www.startrek.com/startrek/view/series/VOY/dvd/set/5914.html
Disc 6: I don't understand 多? Contain two chapters of de Star Trek The Original Series ("Arena" and "The City On The Edge Of Forever") and two DVD Trailers ("Deep Space Nine" and The Next Generation")

Thanks for this great upload kef71.  I've been looking for the series with French audio also, and this is perfect.

About discs 5 & 6: yes, they are "bonus material".  If you only want the episodes, they're on discs 1 to 4.
